title: The future of oncology
itunes:title: The future of oncology
description: Daniel sits down with Dr. Kim Blackwell, former oncologist and Eli Lilly trialist who is now the Chief Medical Officer at Tempus, a technology company that has built the world's largest library of clinical and molecular data as well as an operating system to make that information accessible and useful for patients, physicians, and researchers. They discuss big data, genetic sequencing, and the tech that drives today’s transformative precision cancer treatments.

They discuss big data, genetic sequencing, and the tech that drives today’s transformative precision cancer treatments.
